Articles.Content: I have successfully make a mod. Now I am wondering if I can add a custom audio for the mod? You can visit my website to download the mod.
Look at the [Muon Detector](http://svn.mumech.com/KSP/trunk/MuMechLib/MuonDetector.cs) plugin source. It broadcasts a tone based on the distance to the nearest monoliths.
Also, when I needed originl Ariane sounds, I recorded it from engine test video, it\'s possible way, too.

> 
> Also, when I needed originl Ariane sounds, I recorded it from engine test video, it\'s possible way, too.

I like your ides
